tram ratha palakawarayeku wana adolfus harbat fedrik norman apalroth nohoth bart apalroth mahatha wisin ohu snanaya kirima sandaha bhawithayata ganu labu baldiya upayogi karagena sini saha jelatinyoda ganimin palamu warata jeli kata sakas karana ladi.pasuwa eewa ohuge tram rathaya gaman ganna sidni pradeshaye geyin geta gos wikunana ladi.1917 warshayedi apalroth mahatha ohuge nishpadana katayuthu sandaha kuli godanagillak yoda gath athara 1926 di albat fransis lanarts mahatha samanga ekwa pudgalika wyaparayak arambauha.ema awadhiyedi guwanyana nawa athdakimak wu bawinda apalroth mahatha aakashatharanaya pilibanda dadi loliyek wu bawinda,ohuge mema jeli nishpadanaya eroplen jeli namathi sannam namayen nam karana ladi.[4]1934 warshayedi ohu tayigar mothnamathi guwanyanaya yoda ganimin dushkara pradesha sandaha eroplen jeli beda dunneya.eroplen jeli sandaha karana lada athisarthaka welanda pracharana wyaparaya pasukaleka hola
